    • Constructor Detail

      • HouseField

        public HouseField(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String rent)
        Constructs a HouseField with a given name and rent. Sets a default description, sub description, background color and foreground color
        Parameters:
        name - The title of this HouseField
        rent - The rent of this HouseField

      • HouseField

        public HouseField(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.String subDescription,
                  java.lang.String rent,
                  java.awt.Color backgroundColor,
                  java.awt.Color foregroundColor)
        Constructs a HouseField with all needed information; Name, description, sub description, rent, background color and foreground color
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this HouseField
        description - The description of this HouseField (shown in the card in the middle of the board)
        subDescription - The sub description of this HouseField (shown in the actual field on the board)
        rent - The rent of this HouseField
        backgroundColor - The color of this HouseField background
        foregroundColor - The color of this HouseField foreground
